participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily enjoys crafting stories and engaging with her family.
participant_1.background: I love to work with my hands and create things. I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends. I am looking for a home that is large enough for my family and has a good school district. I have six siblings. I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and adventurous, Michael thrives on helping others reach their goals.
participant_2.background: I'm an avid reader who enjoys reading books that motivate me to achieve my goals. I like bagels with everything on them. My favorite phone is an iPhone. My husband and I have been together for many years, and we are still very much in love. I love adventure; that's why I have been a salesperson all my life.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking for a new home.  Can you help me find a good place to live?
Sure, what are you looking for in a home?
I need a place that is large enough for my family and has a good school district.
I see, and what are some of your hobbies?  Do you like to have a lot of people over?
I love to work with my hands and create things.  I also like to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
Those are great hobbies!  I love to read books, especially ones that help me achieve my goals.
That's great!  I'm glad we have some things in common.  Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I love to go on adventures.  That's why I've been a salesperson all my life.
That's awesome!  I love adventures too.  I've been a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.
That's too bad.  But I'm sure you'll find a new job soon.  And I'm glad we have some things in common.  I'm sure we can find a good home for you and your family.
